contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = ''Marmorosphax'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Scincidae]] | genus = '''''Marmorosphax''''' | range_map = Marmorosphax sp. distribution.svg }} '''Marmorosphax''', <!--commonly known as a "?", --> is a genus of [[skink|skinks]] native to [[New Caledonia]]. ==Classification== '''Genus Marmorosphax''' *''[[Marmorosphax euryotis]]'' (or [[Lygosoma euryotis]]?) (Pale-hipped skink) *''[[Marmorosphax montana]]'' (Montane marble-throated skink) [http://www.amonline.net.au/herpetology/research/species_accounts/m_montana.htm] *''[[Marmorosphax tricolor]]'' (Marble-throated skink) [http://www.amonline.net.au/herpetology/research/species_accounts/m_tricolour.htm] [[Category:Skinks]] {{Wikispecies|Marmorosphax}} {{skink-stub}}
